title: Ask Mr. Bear
description: A sweet picture book where Danny teams up with the animals to find his mother the perfect gift.Trying to find the perfect birthday present for his mother isn’t easy for Danny. The hen offers eggs, the goose feathers, and the sheep wool. But mother already has those things. Then the cow suggests that Danny go ask Mr. Bear. It’s from him that Danny gets a special and unique gift for his mother.
author: Marjorie Flack
